column4: hi there.  is it ok to talk about this version: 2.6.32-25-generic #45-Ubuntu SMP Sat Oct 16 19:48:22 UTC 2010 i686 GNU/Linux or do i need another room?
lsb_release -a will show your version of Ubuntu installed.
heh... didn't know about that one.... Ubuntu 10.04.1 LTS
